dct_title_s: Map of Greece / published by the National Tourist Organization of Greece. (Text)
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading. Map is number 14. "800.000 - June 1963." Map shows three classes of roads, archaeological and historical sites, monasteries, international borders, railway lines, capital cities, villages, mountains, bays, capes, distances in kilometers, and car-ferries. Ancillary map shows main road distances in kilometers. With (on verso): Distance tables showing distances between main towns, between main archaeological sites. Tourist information.
dct_publisher_sm: Athēnai : National Tourist Organization of Greece, 1963.
